overview: Doug Zimmer, a washed-up director in Hollywood who always screw around his leading actresses, needs to find a movie script for up-and-coming actor, Tony D. With help of Alexander, his new partner, he and Alexander, an Austrian who wants to make quick cash, need to convince Rachel, Doug's ex-wife, a famous Hollywood film producer, who is having an affair with another woman named Christine, to help him to make a film. Meanwhile, Doug's wife is having an unknown affair outside of the marriage with a pool boy, despite that they don't have a pool.
title: Chasey Loves Rocco
